ygData.subject: Re: Petition and general opinions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh call this my response day..on the plate thing and guitar..ever try swimming in plate?..where do we keep all those backpacks anyway?...could a gnome
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:32 PM 6/9/99 +0100, you wrote:
>From: David.Lynam@...
>
>I myself soloed from 19 until 24 by fighting gorge hounds in East Karana, it
>wasnt difficult. We can solo all the way if we want, simply Bellow and
>Selo. It just takes a tremendous amount of time and becomes extremely
>tedious to do much without a group later on. Sure I could kill mass amounts
>of light light blue stuff, but why when I could be in a hag killing party or
>take on familiars and sages in mistmoore? You just plain get to see more of
>the game with a bard than with almost any other character. I would have to
>say that us wearing plate is a bit ridiculous, try to play a guitar in a
>full suit of platemail. And it has gotten me in trouble more times than
>not. People think I must be a great tank, since even rangers cant wear
>plate, and will let me take the brunt of damage before they realize the
>plate is purely for show.
>
>Ka`Lend, 27th Wood Elven Bard on Rallos Zek
>
Heh call this my response day..on the plate thing and guitar..ever try
swimming in plate?..where do we keep all those backpacks anyway?...could a
gnome warrior really do near as much damage as an ogre?..magic? whats
that?..ok so i am being a smart ass..my point being this is FANTASY..not
reality..if they made everything real life physics in video games it would
be boring and tedious as hell.
>------------------------------------------------------------------------

>http://www.onelist.com

>
